title: Commander Keen Watch
content:
Hey guys I just registered.

I was wondering if anyone else got this watch when they bought Aliens Ate My Babysitter?

I've had mine since it came out. I've only replaced the batteries and it's lived up until a month ago!

title: Re: Commander Keen Watch

title: f
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Edit: "Keenrush has Forges watch."
Heh, I'm very glad his house hadn't any burglar alarms. And their guard dog was nicely asleep all the time, too. [hr][/quote]

You're making a joke of it but he did send it to you, didn't he?

Is the wacht only made from cheap plastic or is really solid and good quality?

title: Re: f
content:
Of course I'm joking. And yeah, he sent me his Keen games, the watch, and couple of other games and the iD Anthology. That included some Doom character statue, but I haven't placed it on my desk.
Edit: And I had to pay absolutely nothing. Not even any shipping and handling.

And yeah, the clock is made of plastic. Do you really expect a game to include a Rolex? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

Hi again guys.

Sorry I've been really busy lately so I havent gotten a chance to post back (lost my cousin in a helicopter crash off the coast of Djibouti).

The watch is made out of plastic but it lasted up until last month which is amazing to me. It's in great condition "looks" wise.

I'll try and get some pictures up soon. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]
